from keras.layers import Dense, BatchNormalization, Conv2D, MaxPooling2D, Dropout, Flatten
from keras.models import Sequential
from keras.utils import plot_model
from tensorflow.keras.preprocessing.image import ImageDataGenerator
from keras.optimizers import Adam
source.b265ebfa:
traindata = data_generator.flow_from_directory(directory=train_dir, target_size=(224,224), batch_size=128, class_mode='sparse')
testdata = data_generator.flow_from_directory(directory=test_dir, target_size=(224,224), batch_size=128, class_mode='sparse')
source.c8c02db0:
alexNet_model=Sequential()

alexNet_model.add(Conv2D(filters=96, kernel_size=(11,11), strides=(4,4), activation='relu',padding="valid", input_shape=(224,224,3)))
alexNet_model.add(MaxPooling2D(pool_size=(3,3),strides=(2,2)))
alexNet_model.add(BatchNormalization())

alexNet_model.add(Conv2D(filters=256, kernel_size=(5,5), activation='relu',padding="valid"))
alexNet_model.add(MaxPooling2D(pool_size=(3,3),strides=(2,2)))
alexNet_model.add(BatchNormalization())

alexNet_model.add(Conv2D(filters=384, activation='relu', strides=(1,1), kernel_size=(3,3), padding="valid"))
alexNet_model.add(Conv2D(filters=384, activation='relu', strides=(1,1), kernel_size=(3,3), padding="valid"))
alexNet_model.add(Conv2D(filters=256, activation='relu', strides=(1,1), kernel_size=(3,3), padding="valid"))
alexNet_model.add(MaxPooling2D(pool_size=(3,3), strides=(2,2)))
alexNet_model.add(BatchNormalization())

alexNet_model.add(Flatten())
alexNet_model.add(Dense(4096, activation='relu'))
alexNet_model.add(Dropout(0.5))
alexNet_model.add(Dense(4096, activation='relu'))
alexNet_model.add(Dropout(0.5))
alexNet_model.add(Dense(1000, activation='relu'))
alexNet_model.add(Dense(2, activation='softmax'))
source.4b5731cb:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.plot(alexNet_model.history.history['accuracy'])
plt.title('model accuracy')
plt.ylabel('accuracy')
plt.xlabel('epoch')
plt.show()

plt.plot(alexNet_model.history.history['loss'])
plt.title('model loss')
plt.ylabel('loss')
plt.xlabel('epoch')
plt.show()
